ja403:8.2: yācañhi yācati → yācaṃpi yācati (sya1ed, sya2ed) | yācāni yācati (pts-vp-pli1ed) | yācanaṃ yācati (mr) | yācati yācanaṃ (bj -nissya)
ja403:9.1: Na ve dessanti → na ve dissanti (bj) | na ve dussanti (sya1ed, sya2ed) | na ve dissanti (pts-vp-pli1ed) | na videssanti (mr aṭṭha.)
ja403:9.4: Vada tvaṃ → vara taṃ (bj) | vara (sya1ed, sya2ed) | vara tvaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed), bhaññamicchasi → bhaññitamicchasi (sya1ed, sya2ed) | yaññamicchasi (?)
